chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 13 is having a problem as follows:
The edges of the phone are more scratched than ever, from all sides and it's visible at two meters. The screen already has protection that's not transparent and it's strange: you can't check the status of the screen. This isn't conforming to a refurbished one. The most annoying thing is that the phone heats up strongly after three minutes of use. I've never seen this before. It's unsettling.
Thank you for your help,

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, our repair team is unable to fix the issue and we do not have any available stocks for replacement. Instead, we have refunded the customer.

Regards,
AS
